fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to provide a balance between readability and modern aesthetics.
fontTheory.readability: The chosen fonts offer a good balance between readability and style, especially considering different screen sizes.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The hierarchy is established through font size, weight, and spacing, ensuring clear differentiation between headings, body text, and other elements.
fontTheory.fontPairings: The combination of Arial for headings, Georgia for body text, and Courier New for code blocks creates a harmonious and professional look.
